description: Your Search For the Best, Most Effective, All Natural Blackhead Remover & Pore Minimizer is Over!Most women, regardless of age, experience large, clogged pores or blackheads at one point or another. Upon contact with water, Bentonite swells and acts just like a sponge, absorbing, and extracting toxins and impurities like blackheads.Apricot kernel oil is a gentle and light moisturizer, and is very effective on oily and blemish-prone skin because it penetrates the skin so easily, cutting through dirt and oil.And now for the piece de resistance, Lithothamnium Calcareum powder is our star ingredient!This is a true skin superfood.
